explains: n. （因兴奋、疼痛等）尖叫，大叫；狗吠

sentences.en: I learn of their Yelp account.
sentences.cn: 我知道了他们 Yelp 的账户。

sentences.en: From the corner of the store, he heard his son yelp, "What!"
sentences.cn: 在商店角落里，他听到他的儿子大叫：“什么！”

sentences.en: You can write a draft review, but you have to visit the Yelp website to post it.
sentences.cn: 你可以写一篇评论草稿，但你需要访问 Yelp 网站才能发布它。
